name: Zombie Invasion (Trishader Games)
description:
Join the adventure as Arushi, a young ninja who has gone to the Zombie world to fight and save her world from Zombie Invasion. Fight zombies, monsters and bosses in this amazing 2D action platformer game.

Use your agility and stand against the zombies. Her abilities will help you defeat the Bosses. Face the intense challenges and help her world survive the great Invasion.
